cmake_minimum_required (VERSION 3.4.0)
project (jacobi_iterative)

set(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER "dpcpp")

# Set default build type to RelWithDebInfo if not specified
if (NOT CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE)
	message (STATUS "Default CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE not set using Release with Debug Info")
	set (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE "RelWithDebInfo" CACHE
	     STRING "Choose the type of build, options are: None Debug Release RelWithDebInfo MinSizeRel"
	     FORCE)
endif ()

option (BUILD_SYCL_MIGRATED_SUBPROJECT "Build targets from subproject sycl_migrated" OFF)
option (BUILD_SYCL_MIGRATED_OPTIMIZED_SUBPROJECT "Build targets from subproject sycl_migrated_optimized" ON)
option (BUILD_DPCT_SYCL_MIGRATED_SUBPROJECT "Build targets from subproject dpct_sycl_migrated" OFF)

if (BUILD_SYCL_MIGRATED_SUBPROJECT)
	add_subdirectory (sycl_migrated)
endif ()
if (BUILD_SYCL_MIGRATED_OPTIMIZED_SUBPROJECT)
	add_subdirectory (sycl_migrated_optimized)
endif ()
if (BUILD_DPCT_SYCL_MIGRATED_SUBPROJECT)
	add_subdirectory (dpct_sycl_migrated)
endif ()
